articles.title: Four Months, 150K DAU: Agnes Defines What the Next Generation's Group Chat Could Be
articles.summary: Agnes AI, a Singapore-based conversational agent platform, launched in July 2025 and has reached 150,000 daily active users. It offers AI-powered productivity tools within its platform, including Search, Research, AI Slides, Group Chat, and AI Design. Its annual recurring revenue (ARR) is expected to surpass $10 million soon.

articles.title: WPP hedges bets on AI to make â€˜pixel-perfect ads', no agency needed
articles.author: Eleanor Dickinson
articles.summary: WPP has launched WPP Open Pro, an AI-powered marketing platform designed for smaller brands. This platform unifies marketing strategy development, audience evaluation, and content creation by integrating Google's Gemini and other AI technologies. WPP's CEO, Cindy Rose, highlights the platform's ability to expand the company's market and provide more brands with AI-driven tools.

articles.title: Asus Fragrance Mouse MD101 Review Performance and Aroma
articles.author: Himank Tripathi
articles.summary: Asus launched the Fragrance Mouse MD101, a wireless mouse featuring an integrated fragrance compartment for aromatic oil. The mouse offers dual-mode connectivity (2.4GHz + Bluetooth), adjustable DPI settings, and is designed for users who want a stylish and personalized workspace.

articles.title: Enhancing Android Auto with Call Screening: Why It's Essential and How to Implement It To effectively use call screening on Android Auto, follow these steps: 1. **Set Up Call Screening**: Utilize a th
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is launching a Call Screening feature integrated into Android Auto, powered by Google Assistant. This feature intelligently vets incoming calls to minimize distractions and protect against spam and fraudulent inquiries while driving. The feature is customizable and can be set to screen all unknown numbers, suspicious calls, or only known spam calls.

articles.title: 20 Best Beauty Advent Calendars 2025
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Many companies are introducing new advent calendar products. Revolve Beauty offers a 25-day advent calendar filled with brands like Ouai and Olaplex. L'Oreal Paris has a 24-day beauty advent calendar, while E.l.f. introduces a 12-day advent calendar with limited edition festive shades. Burt's Bees also presents a 12 Days of Joy Advent Calendar.

articles.title: Alibaba Unveils $660 AI Glasses and Introduces New ChatGPT Competitor
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Alibaba is launching Quark AI Glasses, available for pre-order on Tmall starting October 24, with an initial price of 4,699 Chinese yuan (approximately $659.40). They are also rolling out AI Chat Assistant within their Quark app. Shipments of the Quark AI Glasses are expected to begin in December.

articles.title: 53 Cheaper Versions Of Pricey Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new products or services that serve as affordable alternatives to existing popular and more expensive options. These include tinted lip balms, curl-defining brushes, sports bras, perfume rollerballs, hair treatments, eyebrow powders, neck and chest creams, lip treatments, self-tanners, setting powders, under eye brighteners, shoulder bags, body lotions, fragrance rollerballs, bracelets, lip tints, blush tints, teeth-whitening pens, earbuds, sunscreen brushes, rings, candles, underwear, biker shorts, mascara, body wash, face towels, tennis bracelets, necklaces, facial cleansers, wineglasses, pajamas, setting spray mist, going out tops, BB creams, tennis skirts, liquid filters, headphones, hair serums, liquid cream blush, cleansing balms, face cream palette, sun hats, thirst burst drops, exercise rompers, blush sticks, woven straw purses, color-changing lipstick, wristlet wallets, body lotions, yoga tops, curl mousse, bakeware sets.

articles.title: 27 Tiny Travel-Sized Items That'll Fit In Your Purse
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new compact and portable travel products. These include a mini travel tumbler by Owala, a mini ChomChom Roller, a mini water flosser, a Neutrogena SPF 50 sunscreen stick, Starface acne stickers, a Subtl Beauty Stack, an Alleyoop Pen Pal, a compact I Dew Care mattifying powder shampoo, and a skyline mini wallet emergency kit. These products are designed for convenience and address common travel-related needs.

articles.title: 37 Things Reviewers Say Are Perfect For Their Home
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Folex Carpet Spot Remover eliminates stains without rinsing or vacuuming, while cleaning cups maintain Keurig machines. Angry Orange pet odor eliminator removes pet accidents, and Affresh dishwasher tablets eliminate residue. A genius humidifier tank cleaner inhibits buildup growth for up to 30 days.

articles.title: Oppo's Find X9 Series Integrates Google's AI Features for Enhanced Performance and Content Creation Capabilities
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Oppo is launching the Find X9 series with deep integration of Google's AI features, enhancing performance and content creation. The Find X9 camera system utilizes AI for super resolution zoom, night mode enhancement, and AI video stabilization. AI-powered tools also simplify video editing with features like automatic highlight reel creation and smart audio enhancement.

articles.title: 32 Newer Little Treats To Buy Yourself
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Eos launched "CrÃ¨me de la CrÃ¨me" Super Balm Minis in Vanilla Confetti, Birthday Cake, and Salted Caramel. Vaseline introduced Sunlit Glow Body Gel with a cocoa vanilla scent. Olay released Wicked hyaluronic serum body washes in Glinda's Couldn't Be Lovelier and Elphaba's Wickedly Wonderful. Native introduced Aluminum-Free Buttercream & Vanilla Deodorant. Liquid I.V. launched Hydration Multiplier Hot Chocolate (limited edition). Touchland Introduced special edition Confetti Cake Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. CeraVe launched Balancing Air Foam Face Wash

articles.title: Smartphone Decline: Galaxy, Pixel, iPhone & Future Woes
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Apple is promoting its services within the iPhone interface and introducing in-app advertising within Apple Maps. Samsung pre-loads budget Galaxy phones with ad-filled widgets and unwanted apps in certain markets like India. Nothing introduced 'Lock Glance' which feels like advertising on the lock screen.

articles.title: Popular San Antonio Creperie @Crepes Now Open on TikTok
articles.summary: @Crepes has launched a TikTok account (@crepes_sanantonio) to attract new customers, showcasing crepe-making processes, menu spotlights, customer features, and promotions. The strategy aims to increase brand awareness, engage with customers, and drive foot traffic to their San Antonio location.

articles.title: Luxe and key
articles.author: Kap Maceda Aguila
articles.summary: BYD has launched the eMax 9 DM-i, a three-row seven-seater hybrid MPV. It features a combination of a 1.5-liter engine and electric motor, offering a range of up to 1,000km. The eMax 9 DM-i is priced at P2.678 million for the Advanced variant and P2.998 million for the Premium.

articles.title: The One with a plug-in hybrid heart
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Jetour Auto Philippines has launched the Jetour T1 Lightning i-DM, a hybrid SUV, in the Philippine market. The T1 Lighting i-DM combines a 1.5-liter gasoline engine with an electric motor and features a 26.7kWh battery. The T1 Lighting i-DM has a special introductory price of P1.798 million.

articles.title: 41 Magical Beauty Products That Work Like Magic
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Various beauty and skincare companies are introducing new products. Essence launched Lash Princess Mascara. Sol De Janeiro introduced a firming cream. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask. R.E.M. Beauty launched Wicked Glinda Makeup Set. I Dew Care introduced dry shampoo powder. Beekman 1802 launched Milk Shake Hydrating Toner & Face Mist. Essence launched What the Fake! Plumping Lip Filler. Saem launched hydrating eye stick. Eos launched CrÃ¨me de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion. Stila launched Stay All Day liquid eyeliner. L'Oreal launched True Match Lumi Glotion. Kosas launched Revealer Concealer. Urban Decay launched All Nighter setting spray.

articles.title: Popular N.Y.-based gourmet market to open 1st N.J. location in new condo complex
articles.author: N.J. News Report
articles.summary: Dumbo Market is expanding to New Jersey, opening a 12,700-square-foot store at Southend Lofts in Hoboken's South End, scheduled to begin operations in Fall 2026. The market will offer a selection of cheeses, fresh organic produce, hot foods, salads, sushi, flowers, and a full-service liquor store.

articles.title: Download Now: Microsoft 365 for Windows Version 2510 Released with New Features and Updates
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Microsoft has released version 2510 of Microsoft 365 for Windows, which includes enhancements to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Teams. The updates include improvements to collaboration, accessibility, dynamic arrays, data connectivity, transition effects, presenter tools, search functionality, and breakout room controls. Users can update through the File > Account menu in any Microsoft 365 application.

articles.title: SXTC-DYADICA Global Brand Consulting Launches AI-Brand 5.0: Redefining the Future of Brand Building with AI Innovation
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: SXTC-DYADICA Global Brand Consulting has launched AI-Brand 5.0, an AI-powered brand application system. AI-Brand 5.0 integrates machine learning, behavioral and creative analytics, neural narrative modeling, and real-time market experience to deliver brand strategies and brand building applications. It empowers brands to anticipate market shifts, automate brand storytelling, and protect brand equity.

articles.title: MiColchon opens flagship store in Mijas
articles.author: Adam Woodward
articles.summary: MiColchon has opened a new flagship store on the Mijas-Fuengirola Road, featuring sleep solutions and premium sofas. The store includes brands like Harrison Spinks, Incanto, Noctis, and Auping, and offers specialized staff trained in sleep solutions and a unique "MatressologyÂ®" methodology.

articles.title: Creating an intelligent future: How generative AI consulting services are shaping new product models
articles.author: Serhii Omelchenko
articles.summary: Generative AI consulting services are enabling businesses to create new products and services by helping them identify opportunities, develop strategies, and implement AI solutions. Companies like N-iX offer consulting services that guide businesses from idea to product, focusing on automation, customization, and customer satisfaction, which allows businesses to integrate generative AI into their product development.

articles.title: Moto X70 Air pre-orders are now available in China, know details about it
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto X70 Air smartphone, a rebranded version of the Motorola Edge 70, has started pre-orders in China and is available on Lenovo Mall and JD.com. The device features a 6.7-inch pOLED display, Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, and a 50MP primary camera, with global launch scheduled for November 5. It is available in two configurations: 12GB RAM + 256GB Storage and 12GB RAM + 512GB Storage.

articles.title: GoGIVE allows young Filipinos to donate
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Globe Prepaid launched GoGIVE, a new service.

articles.title: Wayfair Sleep Memory Foam Mattress under $300 for Way Day sale
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Wayfair is promoting its Wayfair Sleep Memory Foam Mattress during Wayfair Way Day. The mattress features a three-layer design, medium-firm feel, and low-motion transfer, and ships rolled and boxed with a 10-year warranty. It is being offered at a discounted price of under $300.

articles.title: 16 Things That Delighted Us Last Week: From High V-Necks to Mini Duckheads
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Original Duckhead launched a new, more affordable umbrella design. L'OrÃ©al offers a serum with two molecular sizes of hyaluronic acid.  Other skincare launches for Wrinkles Week include serums from SkinMedica, Skinbetter, and LancÃ´me, plus a Japanese moisturizing spray. Degrenne released a teapot with a hidden interior felt layer. Smalls released raised feeders for cats and Pepper introduced smooth, moisture-wicking wireless bras for small-chested people.

articles.title: 30 Products To Make Your Next Outing Easier
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new products designed to improve everyday life, including a Neutrogena SPF 60 face serum for sun protection and hydration, a Clinique Almost Lipstick tinted lip balm, and E.l.f.'s sheer tint "Squeeze Me" lip balm for lip hydration.  Other products include a magnetic phone charger/hand warmer and no-tie Lock Laces to turn lace-up shoes into slip-ons.

articles.title: âš¡Check Moto X70 Price and Other Details Before October 31 Launch in China
articles.summary: Moto X70 Air pre-orders are open in China before its official launch on October 31, 2025. The smartphone, reportedly launching globally as Motorola Edge 70, has had its price and specifications revealed prior to release.

articles.title: A sports car in EV â€” Hyundai's Ioniq 6 N brings the thrill to everyday roads
articles.author: Lim Jae-seong
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Company has launched the Ioniq 6 N, a new high-performance electric sedan, which features a maximum output of 609 horsepower and can accelerate from zero to 100 kilometers per hour in just 3.2 seconds. The Ioniq 6 N includes an artificial sound system and N Drift Optimizer, which allows for precise drift adjustment. The sedan is currently sold in Korea for 79.9 million won ($55,600).

articles.title: 7 Best New Lush Christmas Finds Hitting Shelves This Week â€” Best Life
articles.author: Leah Groth
articles.summary: Lush is introducing new products and bringing back seasonal favorites for the Christmas season. These include the 29Â½ High Street Advent Calendar, Christmas Bathtime Favorites gift set, Snow Fairy products, Yog Nog body spray, Merry Christmas Everyone Shower Gel, Humbug Scrubee Body Scrub, and Celebrate Body Lotion. These items will hit shelves this week.

articles.title: 20 Life-Changing Cleaning Products
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: Several new cleaning products are introduced to address various cleaning needs.  Wet & Forget shower cleaner prevents soap scum and hard water stains with no scrubbing required. Scrub Daddy sponges change texture with water temperature for different cleaning tasks. The Pink Stuff cleaning paste removes stubborn messes on surfaces. Bissell multipurpose portable cleaner removes pet stains and spills from rugs and furniture.  Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop cleans and dries floors streak-free.

articles.title: Harnessing Hope for the Future: An Xbox Leader's Vision for Long-term Success
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing the next-generation Xbox console, tentatively named 'Magnus.' This console will incorporate a 3nm Advanced Processing Unit (APU) utilizing both RDNA 5 and Zen 6 architectures and GDDR7 memory. Microsoft aims to deliver a 'very premium, very high-end curated experience' to compete in the gaming console market.

articles.title: These Highly-Rated Men's Sweatshirts Are About To Become The Coziest Thing In Your Closet
articles.author: Alex Aronson
articles.summary: Amazon offers a variety of highly-rated men's sweatshirts from brands like Nike and Carhartt. These include quarter-zips, classic hoodies, and crewnecks, some with thousands of five-star reviews.

articles.title: This Samsung smart monitor effectively replaced my OLED TV for a week - but there's ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing its new M90SF OLED smart monitor.

articles.title: 37 Products That Practically Pay For Themselves
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Hikerkind introduced a packable down puffer, while Orolay offers a budget-friendly down jacket. Bissell launched a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner, and Tineco presented a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop. Philips released a compact pasta maker, and Caraway unveiled a splurge-worthy 12-piece cookware set. Peloton launched the Bike+ with rotating screen, Boon Nursh created lovely silicone baby bottles and Charmspring released an interactive routine board.

articles.title: The Best Store-Bought Corn Tortillas Are Made With Only These Ingredients
articles.author: Laura Christine Allan
articles.summary: Ramirez & Sons' packaging explicitly states "Nixtamal". La Milpa De Rosa distributes to major grocery chains and details its nixtamal usage on its website. Casa Rica employs an ancient recipe for its tortillas, providing cooking instructions on its website.

articles.title: IKEA unveils super comfortable bed, but not for humans!
articles.summary: IKEA UAE has launched the 'Phone Sleep Collection,' which includes a miniature bed for smartphones. This product aims to encourage customers to reduce their nighttime phone usage. To further incentivize this behavior, IKEA UAE offers a 100 AED voucher to individuals who abstain from smartphone use for seven hours a night for seven consecutive nights.

articles.title: 35 Products So Irresistibly Cool That Your "Add To Cart" Button Will Get Sore
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Lumify Eye Drops are presented as a top-selling product on Amazon, known for reducing eye redness. Eos Marshmallow 'Super Balm' lip treatment is highlighted as a superior lip care product. Catrice 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener is introduced with an updated shade range, celebrated for concealing dark circles. Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream is touted for its hydrating and exfoliating properties, promising visible results in two weeks.

articles.title: Anambra identified as key market as Guinness re-introduces Guinness Smooth brand
articles.author: Daniel Obi
articles.summary: Guinness Nigeria has relaunched Guinness Smooth in Anambra State, featuring a refreshed label, updated packaging, and improved flavor profile. The company aims to provide a flavorful, easy-drinking beer option for consumers and will host hangouts in bars across the state to promote the product.

articles.title: 28 Kitchen Must-Haves For Food Prep, Cooking, & Cleaning
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Ninja introduced the portable Crispi Air Fryer, a system that cooks food in the same container you eat from. FryAway offers a cooking oil solidifier, a plant-based powder that turns cooking oil into a disposable solid. Dawn provides Powerwash dish spray to wipe away crusty messes. Hamilton Beach has a Breakfast Sandwich Maker designed with nonstick layers to cook an egg, bread, and sausage or bacon at once.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 is launching tomorrow, here is everything we know about it so far
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27, 2025, with an India launch expected later. The OnePlus 15 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 7,300mAh battery, a triple camera system and a new Max Engine camera system. It is expected to be priced between Rs 70,000 and Rs 75,000 in India.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Finds To Transform Your Home's Eyesores
articles.author: Courtney Hayes
articles.summary: Lysol introduces toilet bowl cleaner tabs for convenient cleaning. Dyson presents a cordless vacuum cleaner with high-powered suction and whole-machine filtration. Shark launches a robot vacuum with app operation and mapping technology. Clorox introduces toilet wand system with disposable heads for easier and more sanitary cleaning. Bissell releases a carpet cleaner for removing stubborn stains. Rubbermaid offers a three-tier utility cart to declutter kitchen cabinets. Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day introduces multi-surface cleaner, removing bacteria from nonporous surfaces.

articles.title: I Test Blenders for a Living â€“ Don't be Fooled by Flashy Upgrades, The Original Nutribullet is Still Great and Only $49.99 today
articles.author: Lydia Hayman
articles.summary: The NutriBullet Original is presented as a reliable blender for daily smoothies, while the NutriBullet Ultra offers more power and advanced features. The Smeg blender is highlighted as a professional-grade alternative to Vitamix, capable of handling various blending tasks. The Braun MultiQuick Blender is suggested for savory blends and can also be used as a whisk and food chopper.

articles.title: Yes, These 34 Products Are Triple Threats: Gorgeous, Practical *And* Affordable
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new products, including a 14-ounce Stanley Cup, wildflower Band-Aids, and a reversible quilted jacket.  It also features a Baccarat Rouge 540-inspired moisturizing body wash and wide-leg high-waisted yoga pants and wireless over-the-ear headphones, slip-on pointed toe ballet flats, aiming to offer stylish and functional alternatives at accessible price points.

articles.title: S.C. Johnson expands Angelic Fresh line with new fragrances
articles.summary: S.C. Johnson Private Ltd. has launched two new variants of its Angelic Fresh Air Freshener: Wild Lavender and Fresh Lemon, at an event in Dhaka. Wild Lavender blends lavender, jasmine, and vanilla, while Fresh Lemon combines lemon, gardenia, and musk flower. The company, along with strategic partner ACI Limited, anticipates strong market appeal for these new fragrance profiles in Bangladesh.

articles.title: 37 Odd Or Unusual Things To Make Your Freaky Heart Sing
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Colourpop introduced Shrek Ultra Glossy Lip with movie-accurate flavors. Liquid Death launched Cereal Criminal Sparkling Water with a Fruity Pebbles-inspired flavor. TonyMoly released banana hand lotion containing moisturizing vitamin A and banana extract.

articles.title: Fortnite Reveals November 2025 Crew Pack Skin
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Epic Games is unveiling a new skin for Fortnite's November 2025 Crew Pack. This includes the base skin and its alternate styles.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Mega Dimension DLC Release Date Seems Obvious
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A is planned to receive DLC post-launch support. The 'Mega Dimension expansion' release date remains unannounced.

articles.title: From Bathroom Shame to Swagger: San Diego's Patrick Perrine Is Bringing Magic to the Throne
articles.author: Chris Ahrens
articles.summary: Dude Magic launched the Magic Sprayer, a hands-free device that automatically neutralizes bathroom odor. The company is also introducing an odor-eliminating candle line. Pre-orders for Magic Sprayer are live with first shipments expected in Spring 2026.
